name: Shape Shifters (ThePlatformerLabs)
description:
This is a small platformer game I made in about 24 hours of actual work for this year's Ludum Dare 3 day jam compo.

Don't be too harsh I didn't have a full three days to work on it. It was more like one and a half days.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Move - Left & Right or A & D Move

Jump - Space Bar Jump

Shift Shape - Shift Key Shift

XBOX CONTROLLER

Start Game - Start

Move - Directional Pad

Jump - A

Shift Shape - B
